derivation: from G1 (ἄνομος) (as a negative particle) and G3551 (ἄνομος);
kjv_def: without law, lawless, transgressor, unlawful, wicked
strongs_def: lawless, i.e. (negatively) not subject to (the Jewish) law; (by implication, a Gentile), or (positively) wicked
outline:
1. destitute of (the Mosaic) law
    1. of the Gentiles
  2. departing from the law, a violator of the law, lawless, wicked
